lines.text: We don't have to like each other. We just have to get married.
[trying to shift all the blame for their bogus marriage onto Georges]
You stroll around my apartment, touching my things. Do you know what trouble you've gotten me into? Do you?

[in response to Bronte's telling him that she will donate her time to a children's agriculture charity]
If it amuses you, then do it.

[after finishing playing an ultra radical piece on the piano]
Its not Mozart
